text: The Council of European Municipalities and Regions (CEMR) is the largest organisation of local and regional governments in Europe. Its members are 60 national groups of towns, municipalities and regions from 41 countries that are part of the Council of Europe. Together these associations represent about 130,000 local and regional authorities. == Other websites == * * United Cities and Local Governments (UCLG) * Local Government in Europe * The Archives of the Council of European Municipalities and Regions are consultable at the Historical Archives of the European Union in Florence * European elections: local and regional governments' manifesto Category:1950s establishments in Belgium Category:1951 establishments in Europe Category:European organizations Category:Organizations based in Brussels
title: Council of European Municipalities and Regions
